sugerencia: Dating back to *(período de tiempo)*, this cheese was brought to *(lugar)* by *(personas)* from *(lugar)*.
ejemplo: Dating back to{ shortly after the Norman Conquest}, this cheese was brought to {Wensleydale} by {the Cistercian monks of Jervauix Abbey} from {the Roquefort region of France, the famous blue cheese making region.}

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* originated from *(lugar)* around *(siglo)* century and took its name from *(objeto que dio nombre al queso)*.
ejemplo: {Cheddar} originated from {Somerset} around {the late 12th} Century and took its name from {the Gorge or caves in the town of Cheddar that were used to store the cheese.}

sugerencia: It is thought that cheese making was first brought to *(lugar)* in *(siglo)* century by *(personas)* who arrived from *(lugar)* and settled in *(lugar)*. They in turn passed on the cheese making techniques to the local farmers of *(lugar)* and thus, *(nombre del queso)* was born. *(nombre de la quesería)* has been making *(nombre del queso)* in *(lugar)* since *(año)*.
ejemplo: It is thought that cheese making was first brought to{ the Yorkshire dales} in {the 11th} century by{ Cistercian monks} who arrived from {Normandy} and settled in {the local abbeys}. They in turn passed on the cheese making techniques to the local farmers of {Swaledale and thus, Swaledale cheese} was born. {The Reed family} has been making {Swaledale cheese} in {Richmond} since {1987}.

sugerencia: The cheese is still made in the traditional shape using the traditional method and skills. After the addition of starter culture and rennet to the milk, the curds are cut and scalded at a temperature of *(número)* °C with the whey for *(número)* minutes. The whey is then drained away leaving the curd which is milled and salted. The cheese is then moulded and mechanically pressed for up to *(número)* days and is ready for consumption at around *(número)* months.
ejemplo: The cheese is still made in the traditional shape using the traditional method and skills. After the addition of starter culture and rennet to the milk, the curds are cut and scalded at a temperature of {32-35}°C with the whey for {20-30} minutes. The whey is then drained away leaving the curd which is milled and salted. The cheese is then moulded and mechanically pressed for up to {5} days and is ready for consumption at around {2} months.

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* is brine dipped.
ejemplo: {Dovedale} is brine dipped.

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* takes *(número)* hours to make.

sugerencia: The cheese is then shaped into *(forma)* and pressed.

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* is naturally smoked, using *(tipo de madera)*.
ejemplo: {Select cheddar} is naturally smoked, using {real oak chips}

sugerencia: It is gently smoked, over *(tipo de madera)* for *(número)* days.
ejemplo: 6It is gently smoked, over {oak chippings}, for {2} days.

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* is left open to the air to mature which results in a *(cualidad)* rind with a *(color)* mould.
ejemplo: {It} is left open to the air to mature which results in a {hard, natural} rind with a {bluey grey} mould.

sugerencia: It can only be produced in a *(forma)* shape and is never pressed.
ejemplo: {Ashdown Forester} takes {8} hours to make

sugerencia: Some is made in traditional *(forma)*, but the bulk is made in *(forma)*, which then makes the cheese easier to pre-pack.
ejemplo: It can only be produced in a cylindrical shape and is never pressed.

sugerencia: It is made to a traditional recipe with *(origen)* rennet and is crucially hand-ladled.
ejemplo: Is made to a traditional recipe with {animal} rennet and is crucially hand-ladled.

sugerencia: Produced via *(proceso)* of the milk rather than by *(proceso)*
ejemplo: Produced via{ direct acidification} of the milk rather than by {use of bacterial starter cultures}.

sugerencia: After the curds are formed they are scalded, which means that the cheese will not melt when heated.
ejemplo: After the curds are formed they are scalded which means that the cheese will not melt when heated.

sugerencia: Once the curds are produced, the whey is drained off.
ejemplo: Once the curds are produced, the whey is drained off.

sugerencia: The soft curds from their *(animal)* milk are ladled by hand into individual moulds and gently drained.
ejemplo: The soft curds from their {goat's} milk are ladled by hand into individual moulds and gently drained

sugerencia: Curds are formed and left to drain overnight. The whey is removed and the curd cut into *(forma)* and stacked and turned every *(número)* minutes. The curd is milled and salted, put into *(forma)* moulds and lightly pressed. After *(número)* days the mould is removed and the surfaces rubbed to form the crust and at *(número)* weeks skewered to allow air to enter the body of the cheese and so form the blue veins.
ejemplo: Curds are formed and left to drain overnight. The whey is removed and the curd cut into {blocks} and stacked and turned every {20-30} minutes. The curd is milled and salted, put into {cylindrical} moulds and lightly pressed. After {4} days the mould is removed and the surfaces rubbed to form the crust and at {4} weeks skewered to allow air to enter the body of the cheese and so form the blue veins.

sugerencia: The cheese is then sealed with cloth or other wrapping material and at about *(número)* weeks of age the cheese is pierced with stainless steel needles to allow air to enter the body of the cheeses. This activates the blue mould which then proceeds to break down the protein in the cheese and create the blue veins.
ejemplo: The cheese is then sealed with cloth or other wrapping material and at about {5} weeks of age the cheese is pierced with stainless steel needles to allow air to enter the body of the cheeses. This activates the blue mould which then proceeds to break down the protein in the cheese and create the blue veins.

sugerencia: It has *(planta)* leaves wrapped around it after it has come out of the cheese press, and finally it is given a light spraying of penicillium candidum white mould to help give the cheese its unique appearance and flavour.
ejemplo: It has {nettle} leaves wrapped around it after it has come out of the cheese press, and finally it is given a light spraying of penicillium candidum white mould to help give the cheese its unique appearance and flavour.

sugerencia: Mild *(nombre del queso)* is typically sold at about *(número)* months of age; medium matured *(nombre del queso)* at *(número)* to *(número)* months; mature *(nombre del queso)* at around *(número)* months, Extra Mature at around *(número)* months and Vintage at *(número)* months or more.

sugerencia: Traditional uses of *(nombre del queso)* include serving with *(alimentos)* for a perfect lunchtime or tea time snack; with *(alimento)* or with *(alimento)*.
ejemplo: Traditional uses of {Wensleydale} include serving with {fruit cake and an apple} for a perfect luchtime or tea time snack; with {crusty bread} or with {hot apple based desserts such as Apple pie or Apple Crumble.}

ejemplo: Serve on its own or use in cooking to make {Glamorgan sausages, Welsh Rarebit or a cheese and leek sauce }to serve with {chicken or cod}.

sugerencia: Cheese and wine are a match made in heaven and which wine you enjoy with which cheese relies a lot on personal preference
ejemplo: Cheese and wine are a match made in heaven and which wine you enjoy with which cheese relies a lot on personal preference.

sugerencia: On its own it goes very well with either a glass of beer or red wine.
ejemplo: On its own it goes very well with either a glass of beer or red wine.

ejemplo: Theakston’s Old Peculier Ale is the perfect partner.

sugerencia: Our suggestion for this one is a *(nombre de la bebida)*.

sugerencia: It goes splendidly with a *(nombre de la bebida)*.

ejemplo: It is worth trying with a {dark cream sherry} or a{ sweet dessert wine.}

sugerencia: This cheese is perfect with a chilled glass of *(nombre de la bebida)*.

sugerencia: As an accompaniment try a good *(nombre de la bebida)* or *(nombre de la bebida)*.

sugerencia: A wonderful companion to *(nombre de la bebida)* or *(nombre de la bebida)*.

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* is a Protected Designation of Origin.
ejemplo: {White Stilton} is a Protected Designation of Origin

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* is a cheese awarded with a Protected Designation of Origin (PDO).
ejemplo: {Bonchester} is a British cheese awarded with a Protected Designation of Origin (PDO).

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* is a Protected Designation of Origin (PDO) cheese which guarantees it has been made on the farm by hand, using authenticated methods.
ejemplo: {Single Gloucester} is a Protected Designation of Origin (PDO) cheese which guarantees it has been made on the farm by hand, using authenticated methods.

sugerencia: A very special Award Winning *(tipo de queso)* cheese awarded a PDO for its authentic taste.
ejemplo: A very special Award Winning {Lancashire} cheese awarded a PDO for its authentic taste.

sugerencia: It has a Protected Designation of Origin (PDO) which requires that only the milk produced in *(lugar)* be used to make the cheese.
ejemplo: It has a Protected Designation of Origin (PDO) which requires that only the milk produced in {Nottinghamshire, Derbyshire and Staffordshire} be used to make the cheese.

sugerencia: The *(tipo de queso)* recipe and methods are protected and accredited with Protected Designation of Origin (PDO) status. This is recognised worldwide and safeguards the future production and quality of one of the *(lugar)* most cherished treasures.
ejemplo: The {Swaledale} recipe and methods are protected and accredited with Protected Designation of Origin (PDO) status. This is recognised worldwide and safeguards the future production and quality of one of the {dales} most cherished treasures.

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* has a Protected Designation of Origin (PDO) and can only be made in the environs of *(lugar)* from milk produced in *(lugar)*.
ejemplo: {Buxton Blue} has a Protected Designation of Origin (PDO) and can only be made in the environs of {Buxton} from milk produced in {Derbyshire, Nottinghamshire and Staffordshire.}

sugerencia: It is made on farms in *(lugar)* and *(número)* makers are licensed to use the EU Protected Designation of Origin *(tipo de queso)*.
ejemplo: It is made on farms in {the West Country} and {14} makers are licensed to use the EU Protected Designation of Origin {West Country Farmhouse Cheddar}.

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* is honoured with a certification trademark and Protected Designation of Origin status, meaning it can only be made in *(lugar)* to a specified recipe.
ejemplo: {Stilton} is honoured with a certification trademark and Protected Designation of Origin status, meaning it can only be made in {the counties of Nottinghamshire, Derbyshire, and Leicestershire} to a specified recipe.

sugerencia: Producers of the cheese must have a registered herd of *(raza)* *(animal)*, the milk from which is used to make the cheese.
ejemplo: Producers of the cheese must have a registered herd of {Gloucester cows} the milk from which is used to make the cheese.

sugerencia: A *(metal)* medal winner at the *(certamen)*.
ejemplo: A {gold} medal winner at the World Cheese Awards.

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* won a *(metal)* medal at the *(año)* *(certamen)*.
ejemplo: {Ardrahan} won a {silver} medal at the {2001 British Cheese Awards}.

sugerencia: This cheese won the coveted *(categoría)* *(año)*.
ejemplo: This cheese won the coveted {Best Mature Traditional Cheddar in the World 2005.}

sugerencia: It won a *(metal)* medal at the *(año)* *(certamen)* for the *(categoría)*.
ejemplo: It won a gold medal at the 2001 British Cheese Awards for the Best Territorial Cheese.

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* became *(premio)* at the *(certamen)* in *(año)*.
ejemplo: {Tunworth} became {Supreme Champion} at the {British Cheese Awards} in {2006}.

sugerencia: Winner of the prestigious *(premio)* for *(categoría)* at the *(certamen)*.
ejemplo: Winner of the prestigious {Prince of Wales Award} for {Speciality Cheese} at the {Great Yorkshire Show.}

sugerencia: All the cheese produced at *(nombre de la quesería)* is made using only locally sourced milk from farms no more than *(número)* km away. Every cheese is hand crafted to the highest quality standards using time honoured traditional methods.
ejemplo: All the cheese produced at {Grandma Singletons} is made using only locally sourced milk from farms no more than {12 miles (20km)} away. Every cheese is hand crafted to the highest quality standards using time honoured traditional methods

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* is a past *(metal)* medal winner at the *(certamen)* and was *(premio)* at the *(certamen)*.
ejemplo: {Bonchester} is a past {bronze} medal winner at the {British Cheese Awards} and was {Champion Cheese} at the {Royal Highland Show}.

sugerencia: Made by local award winning company *(nombre de la quesería)*.
ejemplo: Made by local award winning company {Rosebud Preserves.}

sugerencia: This cheese came *(ordinal)* in the *(certamen)* *(año)*.
ejemplo: This cheese came {second} in the {world cheese awards 2011}.

sugerencia: It has become increasingly popular helped by numerous cheese show victories, including a victory in the *(año)* *(certamen)* which gave the cheese its first supermarket listing.
ejemplo: It has become increasingly popular helped by numerous cheese show victories, including a victory in the{ 2004 Tesco Cheese Challenge} which gave the cheese its first supermarket listing.

sugerencia: *(nombre del queso)* was crowned *(premio)* at the *(certamen)* held in *(ciudad)* in *(año)* and was runner up in *(año)*.
ejemplo: {Cornish Blue} was crowned {Champion Cheese} at the {World Cheese Awards} held in {Birmingham in November 2010} and was runner up in {2011.}
